document_data.name: Nakata
document_data.mainbody: '''Nakata''' was an ancient spirit of [[Rashemen]], a [[wolf]] [[telthor]] friend of [[Okku]]. She lived in Okku's barrow and served the God of Bears.
document_data.History:
It was said that Nakata's howling lured an army of beasts from over the Tirulag, and eater of souls slew her. Soon after that she become a telthor and slept in Okku's home for many centuries.

In [[1374 DR]], Nakata's soul was eaten by the spirit-eater (the [[Kalach-Cha]]) and she was the first victim of their curse.
document_data.Quotes: {{Quote|''My name... it was Nakata. Memories flow together in this place... it is difficult to know which are your own.''|Nakata}}
